title: Deep Semantic-Visual Alignment for Zero-Shot Remote Sensing Image Scene Classification
venue: Isprs Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing

tldr.text: A Deep Semantic-Visual Alignment (DSVA) model is proposed that takes advantage of the self-attention mechanism in the transformer to associate local image regions together, integrating the background context information for prediction and outperforms other state-of-the-art models on a challenging large-scale RS scene classification benchmark.
